about_the_game:
Get ready for some fun in the forest! In Blue Riding Hood, you will find yourself in the role of Little Red Riding Hood's relative, going to her grandmother with some unusual pies as a gift. But be careful! You will meet wolves, pigs, gnomes and other creatures from fairy tales. You'll be able to throw pies that explode at enemies, creating hilarious chaos and destruction.

This third-person game is full of funny cutscenes, all voice-acted, making the adventure even more exciting. The non-repetitive locations promise plenty of amazing places to explore. Get ready for a dynamic and fun game that will never leave you indifferent!

Game Features:
1. A funny story with a relative of Little Red Riding Hood.
2. Explosive pies to fight enemies.
3. Fascinating cutscenes featuring characters from fairy tales.
4. Unique, non-repeating locations.
5. Meetings with a variety of forest creatures, from wolves to gnomes.
6. Dynamic gameplay that will never let you get bored.
